title: Dear Lord, for All in Pain

lyrics.text:
Dear Lord, for all in pain
we pray to thee;
O come and smite again
thine enemy.

Give to thy servants skill
to soothe and bless,
and to the tired and ill
give quietness.

And, Lord, to those who know
pain may not cease,
come near, that even so
they may have peace.

author: Amy W. Carmichael (1931)
